snippet.title: Metroid - Dark Alliance v2.0 for NES released!!!
snippet.description:
Unlike most Metroid hacks that use the original Metroid as the basis, this Metroid hack is a complete overhaul of the game Blaster Master for NES. Guide Samus on this new journey as she crashes on an unknown planet, then quickly begins to realize the familiarity of the atmosphere. This update fixes several bugs in the original hack, as well as updating graphics on certain levels, bosses, and cutscenes. Also, the music track was rearranged. Enjoy!!!

Download now at http://pacnsacdave.weebly.com/

Buy the cartridge version at http://pacnsacdave1.weebly.com
